item.title: My errors help
item.dc:creator: @superdude541 superdude541
item.description:
@superdude541 wrote:

right now i fixed the errors i wanna make it so it only lets you rc if you have ess with you.

heres the lil code im using probly easily solved.

[code]case 7133: // nature rift
if (HasItemAmount(1436, 10) || playerRights >= 0)
{
actionTimer = 20;
pEmote = 875;
sendMessage(“You craft a nature rune!”);
deleteItem(1436,getItemSlot(1436),1);
addItem(564, 10);
addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[8]), 20);
}
else
{
sendMessage(“You need ess to carft runes!”);
}

break;[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: February 26, 2007, 03:21:17 PM[/size][hr]any1 help plz?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 26, 2007, 03:52:35 PM[/size][hr]dont worry i fixed it

item.title: My errors help
item.dc:creator: @superdude541 superdude541
item.description:
@superdude541 wrote:

ok i tried to make this lil tut for rc, but i get 2 errors help plz they look simple but i duno.

[code]case 7133: // nature rift
if (HasItemAmount(1436, 10) || playerRights >= 0)
{
actionTimer = 20;
pEmote = 875;
sendMessage(“You craft a nature rune!”);
deleteItem(1436,getItemSlot(1436), 10);
addItem(564, 10);
addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[8]), 20);
{
else
{
sendMessage(“You need ess to carft runes!”);
}

break; [/code]

and these are the errors i get.

client.java:1343: 'else' without 'if' else ^ client.java:1360: 'else' without 'if' else ^ 2 errors

and this makes it so if u have the ess it takes it from u and gives u the runes ur crafting but if you dot have the ess it gives the runes anyway?? help plz

Read full topic
